summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and creating an Office of Policy Planning in the Executive Department; providing for the appointment of a Director thereof and defining duties; providing for the organization and specifying the functions of said office; establishing, transferring and abolishing certain offices and positions in connection therewith; establishing expenditure allowances by reappropriation and transfer; and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 103726, Section 3 of Ordinance 102445 and Section 2 of Ordinance 97473 and repealing Section 3 of Ordinance 97473 to effectuate the transfer of certain functions and responsibilities to said office, and to abolish the office of City Planner.
